mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userDTO (id, password, email, recommendFlag, salt) VALUES (#{id}, sha2(concat(#{password}, #{salt}), 256), #{email}, #{recommendFlag}, #{salt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM userDTO WHERE id = #{id} AND password = sha2(concat(#{password}, (SELECT salt FROM userDTO WHERE id = #{id})), 256)
mapper.insert: insert into interest(id, dongCode, dongName) values (#{id}, #{dongcode}, #{dongname})
